Package jade.security

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    DelegationCertificate
    The DelegationCeritificate interface is meant to carry a list of permissions granted to certain principals.
    JADEAccessController
    The JADEAccessController interface represents the way of building a Policy Enforcement Point (PEP) for a component (i.e. a container or an agent) that provides a service.
    JADEAuthority
    The Authority interface represents an authority.
    JADECertificate
    The JADECeritificate interface has to be implemented by classes storing authenticated informations, as identities or delegated permissions.
    PrivilegedExceptionAction
    The PrivilegedExceptionAction interface represents actions that can be executed in a privileged block.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AgentPermission  
    AMSPermission  
    AuthPermission  
    AuthPermissionCollection  
    ContainerPermission  
    MessagePermission  
    Name
    This class is used into policy files as principal.
    PlatformPermission  
    SecurityFactory
    This is a factory class for security-related objects.
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    CertificateEncodingException  
    CertificateException
